Description:
Detects the execution of the hdiutil utility in order to create a disk image.

Author: Omar Khaled (@beacon_exe)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Disk Image Creation Via Hdiutil - MacOS
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%/hdiutil' and command like '%create%'
